name.en: Construction Productivity and Human Resource Management
name.ch: 營建生產力與人力資源管理

department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering
department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班

goal.en: Provide fundamental understanding to students regarding the structure of construction industry. Instruct students to apply research techniques in order to investigate productivity problems on the job site and finding ways to improve productivity bottlenecks.
goal.ch: 讓學生了解營建業之產業結構、生產鏈特性。利用研究方法，分析營建生產力問題與克服生產力障礙之方法。
